mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_check_data_sta_column_${enterpriseId} (task_id, business_id, data_table_id, check_data_table_id, data_sta_column_id, meta_table_id, meta_column_id, meta_column_name, description, supervisor_id, category_name, check_result, check_result_id, check_result_name, check_pics, check_text, check_video, check_score, deleted, reward_penalt_money, patrol_store_time, score_times, award_times, weight_percent, column_max_score, column_max_award, column_type, patrol_type, check_result_reason, check_type) VALUES
( #{item.taskId}, #{item.businessId}, #{item.dataTableId}, #{item.checkDataTableId}, #{item.dataStaColumnId}, #{item.metaTableId}, #{item.metaColumnId}, #{item.metaColumnName}, #{item.description}, #{item.supervisorId}, #{item.categoryName}, #{item.checkResult}, #{item.checkResultId}, #{item.checkResultName}, #{item.checkPics}, #{item.checkText}, #{item.checkVideo}, #{item.checkScore}, #{item.deleted}, #{item.rewardPenaltMoney}, #{item.patrolStoreTime}, #{item.scoreTimes}, #{item.awardTimes}, #{item.weightPercent}, #{item.columnMaxScore}, #{item.columnMaxAward}, #{item.columnType}, #{item.patrolType}, #{item.checkResultReason}, #{item.checkType})
mapper.update:
update tb_check_data_sta_column_${enterpriseId}
check_result = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.checkResult},check_result)
END, check_result_id = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.checkResultId},check_result_id)
END, check_result_name = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.checkResultName},check_result_name)
END, check_pics = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.checkPics},check_pics)
END, check_video = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.checkVideo},check_video)
END, check_text = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.checkText},check_text)
END, check_score = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.checkScore},check_score)
END, reward_penalt_money = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.rewardPenaltMoney},reward_penalt_money)
END, score_times = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.scoreTimes},score_times)
END, award_times = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.awardTimes},award_times)
END, weight_percent = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.weightPercent},weight_percent)
END, column_max_score = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.columnMaxScore},column_max_score)
END, column_max_award = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.columnMaxAward},column_max_award)
END, check_result_reason = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.checkResultReason},check_result_reason)
END, patrol_store_time = CASE id
WHEN #{item.id} THEN IFNULL(#{item.patrolStoreTime},patrol_store_time)
END,
where id in (
#{item.id}
) and business_id = #{businessId} and check_data_table_id = #{checkDataTableId} and deleted = 0
mapper.select: select data_table_id as dataTableId, category_name as categoryName, count(*) as totalNum, sum(if(check_result='PASS',1,0)) as passNum, sum(if(check_result='FAIL',1,0)) as failNum, sum(if(check_result='INAPPLICABLE',1,0)) as inapplicableNum, sum(check_score) as totalCheckScore, sum(column_max_score) as totalScore from tb_check_data_sta_column_${enterpriseId} where business_id = #{businessId} and check_type = #{checkType} and deleted = 0 group by data_table_id, category_name

update.foreach:
update tb_check_data_sta_column_${enterpriseId}
task_id = #{record.taskId},
business_id = #{record.businessId},

data_sta_column_id = #{record.dataStaColumnId},
meta_table_id = #{record.metaTableId},
meta_column_id = #{record.metaColumnId},
meta_column_name = #{record.metaColumnName},
description = #{record.description},
supervisor_id = #{record.supervisorId},
category_name = #{record.categoryName},
check_result = #{record.checkResult},
check_result_id = #{record.checkResultId},
check_result_name = #{record.checkResultName},
check_text = #{record.checkText},
check_score = #{record.checkScore},
deleted = #{record.deleted},
reward_penalt_money = #{record.rewardPenaltMoney},
patrol_store_time = #{record.patrolStoreTime},
score_times = #{record.scoreTimes},
award_times = #{record.awardTimes},
weight_percent = #{record.weightPercent},
column_max_score = #{record.columnMaxScore},
column_max_award = #{record.columnMaxAward},
column_type = #{record.columnType},
patrol_type = #{record.patrolType},

check_type = #{record.checkType},
check_pics = #{record.checkPics},
check_video = #{record.checkVideo},
where id = #{record.id}
